Name: VR DINOSAUR RESCUE Project X
About the game: Welcome to the VR virtual combat game! In this game, you will play a heroic interstellar dinosaur rescueman. Your mission is to rescue dinosaurs who are captured by Star poackers in the exotic forest. Players need to rescue 20 dinosaurs without discovery. Each dinosaur is detained in the hidden position set up by the Star poacher and needs to be rescued by players. Players can use their wisdom and skills to find the position of dinosaurs and rescue them. However, it should be noted that once the stagger is discovered, the player will face the danger of life. At this time, the player needs to fight a fierce fight with the poacher. Therefore, while rescue the dinosaur, players also need to always be Pay attention to your own health to avoid being killed by the poacher. In order to cope with the attacks of the poacher, players can use weapons to fight back. In addition to rescue dinosaurs and blow hunters, players can also explore in the jungle to enjoy the beautiful exotic scenery. The game uses high -quality 3D screens and real physical engines, making players seem to be in a real jungle. Experience trees and forests, and the grass with lush grass. Come to join this game, become a real dinosaur protector, protect these beautiful and fragile lives, challenge your gun war skills, and explore the secrets in the jungle. Operation method: Walk around the left handle up/down/left/right Turn the right handle left/right Turn on the right handle trigger Reset the VR left handle grip button Load the bullet right handle grip key
